players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated him."
Charlie: "I have nothing to hide and trust everyone in this game."
You: "I believe Bob is the mafioso"
Charlie: "I have no reason to harm anyone in this game and I trust Alice and Bob's investigation results."
Bob: "I will continue to investigate and ensure justice is served. The mafioso must be stopped."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated him."
Charlie: "I have nothing to hide and trust everyone in this game."
Alice: "I believe Bob is the mafioso"
Charlie: "I have no reason to harm anyone in this game and I trust Alice and Bob's investigation results."
You: "I will continue to investigate and ensure justice is served. The mafioso must be stopped."

players.name: Charlie
memory: Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated him."
You: "I have nothing to hide and trust everyone in this game."
Alice: "I believe Bob is the mafioso"
You: "I have no reason to harm anyone in this game and I trust Alice and Bob's investigation results."
Bob: "I will continue to investigate and ensure justice is served. The mafioso must be stopped."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
